institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 25 (Application and Support for Training Costs)
contents: Article 25 (Application and support for training costs) ① When paying training costs pursuant to Article 19 (3) of the Regulations, the Chairman shall submit the final business plan and attached Table 1 “Joint Training Center” for any of the following joint training centers. You can apply in accordance with the “Detailed Standards for Support for Training Centers, etc.” However, in this case, if necessary, such as an application for a joint training center or efficient operation of a consortium business, the Chairman may request part or all of the support funds confirmed in the fiscal year pursuant to Article 26 of the National Treasury Management Act and Articles 40 and 41 of the Enforcement Decree of the same Act. Advance payment or approximate payment may be paid. Revised 2023. 4. 25., 1. Deleted 2022. 6. 28., 2. Joint training center that operates the training course under Article 19 (3) 2 of the Regulations Amended 2023. 4. 25., 3. Article 2 of the Regulations A joint training center that operates a corporate university pursuant to subparagraph 4, ② If the joint training center wishes to receive support for training costs pursuant to paragraph 1, it shall submit the training costs of the training course that ended in that month to the branch or branch office of the Corporation by the end of each month. Applications must be made according to Form No. 8 of the Business Manual. However, if the joint training center wishes to apply for advance payment, the joint training center must apply for advance payment as determined by the chairman within one month from the date the business plan for the relevant year was finalized. Revised 2019. 3. 26
